title: Fun fact about tennis

title: Artistic pigeons
post: Trained pigeons can differentiate between the paintings of Pablo Picasso and Claude Monet.

title: Theodore Roosevelt fighting skills
post: Theodore Roosevelt was the first American to earn a brown belt in judo.

title: Ozzy Osbourne carrier
post: Before he sang lead vocals for Black Sabbath, Ozzy Osbourne worked in a slaughterhouse.
